Package net.nanopool.contention

Interface Summary
ContentionHandler A ContentionHandler decides what to do when we reckon there's contention on the pool.
 

Class Summary
DefaultContentionHandler The default ContentionHandler implementation.
ResizingContentionHandler The ResizingContentionHandler will, upon contention, try to increase the size of the pool.
SleepyContentionHandler A sleepy implementation of ContentionHandler.
ThrowingContentionHandler An implementation of ContentionHandler that throws a NanoPoolRuntimeException when there's too much contention on the pool.
